Swath_width

xemu version
xemu-0.8.85-master-8cc83dfc437312d31d20230383a99384edfe6bbd
Platform
Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS - Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700K CPU @ 4.00GHz
Renderer
Vulkan
GL info
NVIDIA Corporation - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070-PCIe-SSE2 - 4.0.0 NVIDIA 570.148.08
GLSL version
4.00 NVIDIA via Cg compiler
Description
Tests the behavior of NV097_SET_SWATH_WIDTH (0x09f8).
Suite class def
src/tests/swath_width_tests.h

SwathWidth00

Sets NV097_SET_SWATH_WIDTH to 0x00.

SwathWidth01

Sets NV097_SET_SWATH_WIDTH to 0x01.

SwathWidth02

Sets NV097_SET_SWATH_WIDTH to 0x02.

SwathWidth03

Sets NV097_SET_SWATH_WIDTH to 0x03.

SwathWidth04

Sets NV097_SET_SWATH_WIDTH to 0x04.

SwathWidth0F

Sets NV097_SET_SWATH_WIDTH to 0x0F (correlated with turning antialiasing off).
